headline: News Corporation (NWS): Among Jeff Smith’s Top Activist Targets
summary: We recently published a list of Jeff Smith’s Top 10 Activist Targets and Their Returns Compared to the S&P 500. In this article, we are going to take a look at where News Corporation (NASDAQ:NWS) stands against other Jeff Smith’s top activist targets.
